fasper.base
Interface ASTFilter

public interface ASTFilter

Common interface for token text filters. See examples in this package's description.

See Also:
DefaultASTComparator

Method Summary

          Filters the input string of the specified AST node.

Method Detail

filterNode

String filterNode(AST _node)
Filters the input string of the specified AST node. You can use some regex to filter the strings (token's text). Ussualy filters that inherit this interface are put in a HashMap and mapped by token type string (eg SUPER_TOKEN).

Parameters:
_node - the string to be filtered
Returns:
Returns the filtered string

isNodeIgnored

boolean isNodeIgnored(AST _node)
Computes ignore state of the given node. Returns true if node is ignored (and also it's children).

Parameters:
_node - The node to be filtered.
Returns:
Returns true if _node and it's kids should be ignored

useTokenMap

void useTokenMap(HashMap _tokenMap)
Specify the tokenMap to be used.

Parameters:
_tokenMap -
